name: UIPencilPreferredAction
desc: The preferred double-tap actions that a user can select from in the Settings app.

items.name: case ignore
items.desc: The action indicating to ignore double taps a user makes on Apple Pencil.

items.name: case switchEraser
items.desc: The action indicating to switch from the current tool to the eraser.

items.name: case switchPrevious
items.desc: The action indicating to switch from the current tool to the one previously in use.

items.name: case showColorPalette
items.desc: The action indicating to display a color palette.
